extendedInfo.description: Not a morning person? Waking up has never been as much fun when you create a personalized alarm with byME Time.Your Android phone features many applications, but the alarm app by byME Tech aims to make your mornings a little more pleasant. Donât be late ever again. Whether youâre traveling or just need a reliable wake-up call, enjoy the convenience of having an alarm on your cell phone that you can take with you anywhere you go and set any time you want.Available in both a free version and a full featured paid version. Start by installing the free version and then upgrade to byME Time Plus within the app!Free Version Features: - Free app- Includes 10 cool alarm sounds - Air Horn - Alarm Bell - Birds in the Forest - Alarm Clock Buzzing - Cat's Meow - Dixie Horn - Dog's Bark - Rooster's Crow - Siren - Whistle- Option to use your phone's ring tones or MP3s for alarm sounds- Many different snooze options and durations - Turn the snooze feature on, off, or make the length of the snooze cycle decrease each time by choosing incremental to coax you out of bed.- Ability to set alarm volume to your preference. Crank it up to wake you up!- Set your phone to vibrate when the alarm sounds to start your day with a little buzz!- Write yourself an alarm message of up to 140 characters reminding you why you have to get up - Set multiple alarms, each with different options and messagesFull Version Features (byME Time Plus)- No Ads to view in the app- 5 more alarm sounds - Bear's Growl - Drumline - Native American Flute - Submarine Horn - Soothing Ocean Waves- Plus Wake-Me-Up: To make sure you really are awake when you dismiss the alarm, you have to complete the selected task to turn off the alarm.  - Chasing Time: That little bugger, time, always running away from you. Give him a good tap to shut him up! - Typewriter: They say a monkey randomly hitting the keys of a typewriter will eventually recreate the works of Shakespeare. Letâs see what you can do. Retype the message you see from the typewriter within 30 seconds or the alarm will sound again.  - Math Solver: Solve the math question on the chalkboard in 30 seconds or the alarm will sound again, and yes, you can ask for a different problem.More info at www.bymetech.comkeywords: alarm, alarm clock, alarm app, free alarm, mp3 alarm, music alarm, typewriter alarm, captcha alarm, math alarm

reviews.title: great app and its free!
reviews.comment: Well rounded set of features and the Plus Wake Me Up funcionality sounds fun. Will be purchasing those shortly!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great replacement alarm
reviews.comment: Easy to use with great features. I really like the alarm pop up menu with the traditional android slide unlock.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Shubham
reviews.comment: Poor.. Nothing is great in it except the sounds.. Uninstalling!. Infact i got a better alarm application - Alarm Clock Plus.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great alarm
reviews.comment: I really like that you have a choice of alarm sounds.  This is a great replacement alarm that is easy to use and very functional.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Don\'t even waste your time installing this RUBBISH app. The alarm doesn\'t even go off at the right time, and the sound is extremley poor. I think i\'ll stick with the alarm clock provided on my phone thankyou!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Get alarm clock plus
reviews.comment: Its ok but with this id rather use my built in alarm. Its nothing special at all, but i recomend alarm clock plus thats a really good alarm app and it has much better features.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Terrible!
reviews.comment: Didn\'t even get to use it once!
reviews.author: Stephanie Landaverde
